info.title: team01-api-Skyfly API Documentation
info.description: Development For Final Project Binar FSW1 Team1 Fullstack Dashboard for a library designed to manage library data and a library website utilizing, Express.js as the backend and Postgress as the Database Management System (DBMS)

post.summary: Return result of user login API
post.description: This API is for user login

requestBody.description: Request body for successful user login

200.description: Login success

message.example: "password" length must be at least 8 characters long

get.summary: Return result of user login API by google auth
get.description: This API is for user login by google auth

requestBody.description: Request body for successful user login

200.description: Login success

message.example: "password" length must be at least 8 characters long

post.summary: Return result of user forget password
post.description: This API is for user forget password

requestBody.description: Request body for forget password

200.description: Sending link to email for reset password

message.example: Reset password link has been sent, please check your email

put.summary: Return result of user forget password
put.description: This API is for user forget password

requestBody.description: Request body for reset password

200.description: Reset password

post.summary: Returns the result of the registration API
post.description: This API is used for user registration.

requestBody.description: Request body for successful registration.

200.description: Successful registration

message.example: Verification token has been sent, please check your email
name, email, and password must be filled

put.description: This API is for otp verification

requestBody.description: Request body for otp verification

200.description: Reset password

post.description: This API is for resend otp

200.description: resending the otp

message.example: Verification token has been sent, please check your email
Wrong Password or user not found

post.summary: Return result of resend otp via SMS
post.description: This API is for resend otp via SMS

requestBody.description: Request body for resendSMS otp

200.description: resending the otp

message.example: Wrong Password or user not found

get.summary: Return result HIT API get all airlines data
get.description: This is an API for getting all airlines data

200.description: Success getting all airlines data

post.summary: Return result HIT API create airline
post.description: This is an API for creating airline data

requestBody.description: This is a request body for create new airline

200.description: Success create new airline data

message.example: "code" with value "P44" fails to match the required pattern: /^(?!\s*$)[a-zA-Z\s]+$/
Airline with code: GF already exist!

get.summary: Return result HIT API get airline by id
get.description: This is an API for getting airline data based on Id

200.description: Success getting airline data based on Id

put.description: This is an API for updatting airline data based on Id

requestBody.description: This is a request body for update airline

200.description: Success editting airline data based on Id

message.example: "code" with value "F7" fails to match the required pattern: /^(?!\s*$)[a-zA-Z\s]+$/

delete.summary: Return result HIT API delete airline by Id
delete.description: This is an API for deletting airline data based on Id

200.description: Success deletting airplane data based on Id

"phoneNumber" length must be at least 10 characters long
